General.Name: Al Sorayai Trading&Industrial Group
General.Description: Naseej International Trading Company manufactures, imports, exports, wholesales, and retails carpets and rugs in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company's products also include flooring, furniture and furnishings, antiques, office furniture, blankets, kitchens, bed sheets, curtain fabrics and accessories, tuft, and yarns. In addition, it provides maintenance services for factories, governmental, and private institutions. The company was formerly known as Al Sorayai Trading And Industrial Group Company. Naseej International Trading Company was founded in 1953 and is based in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Industrial City - Phase One, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, 21441
